originalText.text: Min is great! Best Verizon customer service I’ve ever had, totally recommend.

text.text: Min is great! Best Verizon customer service I’ve ever had, totally recommend.

originalText.text: Went to the store to replace my phone and Isaac Levi was very helpful. He was efficient and accommodating, and made the process very easy and stress-free. Thanks, Isaac!

text.text: Went to the store to replace my phone and Isaac Levi was very helpful. He was efficient and accommodating, and made the process very easy and stress-free. Thanks, Isaac!

originalText.text: I recently purchased a phone at this Verizon store on Lexington, and I couldn't be happier with the care and service I got from the store manager Isaac.. He was very knowledgeable he answered every question I had so patiently... he helped set up my iPhone, he helped with all my accounts, transfer all my data from my old phone to my new phone.  Help me with all my accessories, Everything from A-Z!!  I left store feeling so happy because I was able to get everything done so quickly.. I would absolutely  recommend this store to all my friends! If you want the best care and service ask for Isaac.

text.text: I recently purchased a phone at this Verizon store on Lexington, and I couldn't be happier with the care and service I got from the store manager Isaac.. He was very knowledgeable he answered every question I had so patiently... he helped set up my iPhone, he helped with all my accounts, transfer all my data from my old phone to my new phone.  Help me with all my accessories, Everything from A-Z!!  I left store feeling so happy because I was able to get everything done so quickly.. I would absolutely  recommend this store to all my friends! If you want the best care and service ask for Isaac.

originalText.text: I had an extremely positive experience at this Verizon store. In the past, I have always dreaded getting a new phone because of the process and how long it takes. Today, it was such an easy process and Isaac couldn’t have been more helpful. Isaac helped me upgrade my phone, disconnect my old one and explained the pricing to me so clearly. It took less than a half hour! He did everything for me and answered all of my questions. He even spent the time with me to look over some things on my account. While we were in there, an older woman came in upset that her landline and WiFi weren’t working. Even though this was a location for only cellphones (this woman did not have a cellphone), Isaac took the time to call a representative for her and assist her with her landline issues with extreme patience and understanding. Such a nice guy and knowledgeable employee! I highly recommend stopping in this location and working with Isaac l.

originalText.text: Had the best experience with this store, they treat customer very good isaac is the best sales person there thank you for helping me out with my service, definitely recommend all my family and friends to you.
